{{cpp/io/basic_ofstream/title |native_handle}}

{{ddcl|since=c++26|
native_handle_type native_handle() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the implementation defined underlying handle associated with {{tt|basic_filebuf}}. The behavior is undefined if {{c|is_open()}} is {{c|false}}.

===Return value===
{{c|rdbuf()-&gt;native_handle()}}

===Notes===
{{feature test macro|__cpp_lib_fstream_native_handle|std=C++26|value=202306L|native handles support}}
